statements: SELECT * FROM content_schedule ORDER BY content_name DESC;
SELECT content_name, publish_date FROM content_schedule WHERE is_published=true;
SELECT content_name, publish_date FROM content_schedule WHERE schedule_id=1;
SELECT * FROM content_schedule WHERE is_published=false ORDER BY publish_date ASC;
SELECT content_name FROM content_schedule WHERE publish_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM content_schedule WHERE is_published = true
SELECT content_name, publish_date FROM content_schedule WHERE publish_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT schedule_id, content_name FROM content_schedule ORDER BY content_name ASC
SELECT * FROM content_schedule WHERE publish_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND is_published = false
SELECT content_name, publish_date FROM content_schedule WHERE is_published = true ORDER BY publish_date DESC
SELECT * FROM publication_channel WHERE id = 1;
SELECT channel_name, channel_type FROM publication_channel WHERE id = 2;
SELECT title FROM content_schedule WHERE publication_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT id, description FROM content_schedule WHERE id BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT channel_name, channel_type FROM publication_channel ORDER BY channel_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM content_schedule WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, description FROM content_schedule WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM publication_channel WHERE channel_type = 'Social Media' ORDER BY channel_name ASC;
SELECT id, title FROM content_schedule WHERE description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT channel_name FROM publication_channel WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3) AND channel_type = 'Email' ORDER BY channel_name DESC;
SELECT id, title, publish_date FROM content_schedule;
SELECT * FROM category WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM author WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM content_schedule ORDER BY publish_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, title, content FROM content_schedule WHERE publish_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM content_schedule WHERE publish_date >= '2022-01-01' AND title LIKE '%example%' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT title, publish_date FROM content_schedule WHERE publish_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY publish_date ASC;
SELECT content FROM content_schedule WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) AND content LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY id;
SELECT id, title, publish_date, content FROM content_schedule INNER JOIN category ON content_schedule.id = category.id WHERE category.name = 'Technology' ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT author.name, author.email, content_schedule.title FROM author LEFT JOIN content_schedule ON author.id = content_schedule.id WHERE author.id IS NOT NULL AND content_schedule.id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM content_schedule;
SELECT content_title, publish_date FROM content_schedule;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM publishing_clients;
SELECT * FROM published_content ORDER BY publishing_date DESC;

SELECT content_title, platform_name FROM content_schedule JOIN published_content ON content_schedule.content_id=published_content.content_id JOIN publishing_platforms ON published_content.platform_id=publishing_platforms.platform_id
SELECT * FROM content_schedule;
SELECT content_title, publish_date FROM content_schedule ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM publishing_clients WHERE client_id = 1;

SELECT content_title, platform_name, publishing_date FROM content_schedule JOIN published_content ON content_schedule.content_id = published_content.content_id JOIN publishing_platforms ON published_content.platform_id = publishing_platforms.platform_id;

SELECT content_title, platform_name FROM content_schedule JOIN published_content ON content_schedule.content_id = published_content.content_id JOIN publishing_platforms ON published_content.platform_id = publishing_platforms.platform_id WHERE content_schedule.publish_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Content_Schedule ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT content_title, author FROM Published_Content WHERE publish_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY author_id ASC;
SELECT content_title, publish_date FROM Content_Schedule WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT author_name, email FROM Content_Authors ORDER BY author_name DESC;
SELECT content_title, tag_name FROM Published_Content JOIN Content_Tags ON Published_Content.content_id = Content_Tags.tag_id ORDER BY content_title ASC;
SELECT * FROM Content_Schedule ORDER BY schedule_id DESC;
SELECT content_title, author FROM Content_Schedule WHERE publish_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY publish_date ASC;
SELECT author_name, email FROM Content_Authors WHERE author_id IN (SELECT author_id FROM Published_Content);
SELECT tag_name, COUNT(*) AS tag_count FROM Content_Tags GROUP BY tag_name HAVING tag_count > 1;
SELECT content_title, category_name FROM Published_Content JOIN Content_Categories ON Published_Content.content_id = Content_Categories.category_id ORDER BY content_title ASC;
